desc: This course covers more advanced concepts of JAX-RS. You will learn some important concepts related to resource life cycle, authentication and client APIs. You will also implement framework extensions like converters, message readers and writers.
name: Advanced JAX-RS
objectives: Bootstrapping JAX-RS applications with Application class
Building a REST API client in Java using JAX-RS

1.unitDescription: Learn how to setup a JAX-RS application in an environment-agnostic way using the Application class. Deploy a REST API web application on Tomcat without a servlet.xml.

lessons.description: Welcome to the course! This video provide a quick introduction to the topics that will be covered in this course.
lessons.title: Introduction
